Name: Max Gentlemen
About the game: Max Gentlemen is an arcade-style extreme manners simulator about stacking hats, inspired by a spam email for male enhancement. Hat stacking old timey arcade actionÂ™ Over 39 hats to collect Cross-platform local multiplayer Extra characters, levels and modes Online leaderboards Challenge your friends. Prove once and for all who is the most gentlemanly. Seriously though, 2 player is super fun. Max Gentlemen is a FREE game but if you want to support us, there are a variety of extra characters, hats and levels to buy. More updates to come!
